Package socialmagnet.controller

Class FarmerController

java.lang.Object
socialmagnet.controller.FarmerController
public class FarmerController
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents the FarmerController class that contains the methods representing the actions that the farmer can perform

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FarmerController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clearCrops​(java.lang.String username)
    Clear crops that have withered from the specified user's farm and displays the amount of gold lost.
    java.lang.String getWealthStatus​(java.lang.String username)
    The method gets the wealth status of the specified user
    void harvestCrops​(java.lang.String username)
    Harvest crops ready to be harvested from the specified user's farm and displays the amount of xp and gold earned from the harvest.
    void plantCrop​(java.lang.String username, int plotNumber, java.lang.String cropName)
    Plant the specified crop identified by its name on the specified plot belonging to the specified user
    boolean sendGift​(Member sender, java.lang.String receiverName, java.lang.String cropName)
    Sends a bag of seeds of the specified crop from the specified receiver to the specified sender
    void showPlots​(java.lang.String username)
    Displays the plots of land the specified user have and shows if the plot of land is empty.
    void stealCrops​(java.lang.String thiefUsername, java.lang.String victimUsername)
    The method enables the specified thief, identified by his username to steal crops from the victim user, also identified by his username.

  • Method Details

    • harvestCrops

      public void harvestCrops​(java.lang.String username)
      Harvest crops ready to be harvested from the specified user's farm and displays the amount of xp and gold earned from the harvest.
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username

    • clearCrops

      public void clearCrops​(java.lang.String username)
      Clear crops that have withered from the specified user's farm and displays the amount of gold lost.
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username

    • plantCrop

      public void plantCrop​(java.lang.String username, int plotNumber, java.lang.String cropName)
      Plant the specified crop identified by its name on the specified plot belonging to the specified user
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username
      plotNumber - An integer representing the id of the plot to plant the crop on
      cropName - A String representing the name of the crop to be planted

    • sendGift

      public boolean sendGift​(Member sender, java.lang.String receiverName, java.lang.String cropName)
      Sends a bag of seeds of the specified crop from the specified receiver to the specified sender
      Parameters:
      sender - A Member object representing the sender
      receiverName - A String representing the receiver's username
      cropName - A String representing the name of the crop
      Returns:
      Returns true if the gift is successfully sent, else returns false

    • showPlots

      public void showPlots​(java.lang.String username)
      Displays the plots of land the specified user have and shows if the plot of land is empty. If the plot of land is not empty, the progress of the crop's growth is displayed.
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username

    • stealCrops

      public void stealCrops​(java.lang.String thiefUsername, java.lang.String victimUsername)
      The method enables the specified thief, identified by his username to steal crops from the victim user, also identified by his username.
      Parameters:
      thiefUsername - A String representing the thief's username
      victimUsername - A String representing the victim's username

    • getWealthStatus

      public java.lang.String getWealthStatus​(java.lang.String username)
      The method gets the wealth status of the specified user
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username
      Returns:
      A String representing the user's wealth ranking or status in the City Farmers game
